org.apache.flink.graph.library.similarity

类 AdamicAdar<K extends CopyableValue<K>,VV,EV>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.graph.utils.proxy.GraphAlgorithmWrappingBase<K,VV,EV,DataSet<T>>
      • org.apache.flink.graph.utils.proxy.GraphAlgorithmWrappingDataSet<K,VV,EV,AdamicAdar.Result<K>>
        • org.apache.flink.graph.library.similarity.AdamicAdar<K,VV,EV>
  • 类型参数:
    K - graph ID type
    VV - vertex value type
    EV - edge value type
    所有已实现的接口:
    GraphAlgorithm<K,VV,EV,DataSet<AdamicAdar.Result<K>>>

    public class AdamicAdar<K extends CopyableValue<K>,VV,EV>
extends GraphAlgorithmWrappingDataSet<K,VV,EV,AdamicAdar.Result<K>>
    http://social.cs.uiuc.edu/class/cs591kgk/friendsadamic.pdf

    Adamic-Adar measures the similarity between pairs of vertices as the sum of the inverse logarithm of degree over shared neighbors. Scores are non-negative and unbounded. A vertex with higher degree has greater overall influence but is less influential to each pair of neighbors.

    This implementation produces similarity scores for each pair of vertices in the graph with at least one shared neighbor; equivalently, this is the set of all non-zero Adamic-Adar coefficients.

    The input graph must be a simple, undirected graph containing no duplicate edges or self-loops.
